oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Letters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The top part of a letter in Hebrew. Torn. Only the first couple of lines of the letter were left. The letter begins with "be-shimkha rahmana" (in your name, o merciful). The following line contains a series of Hebrew honorary degrees to the recipient of the letter. It is possible that the rest of the letter was written in Judaeo-Arabic.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hebrew letter
